gamerule.scheduledTickInformationRange: The range for providing scheduled tick information to nearby players
config.scheduledtickvisualizer.title: ScheduledTickVisualizerConfig
config.scheduledtickvisualizer.main_rend: Enable to see all the scheduled tick information.
config.scheduledtickvisualizer.tick_type: When enabled, the execution order of scheduled ticks within a sub-game tick will be rendered.
config.scheduledtickvisualizer.sub_order: Enable to see all the scheduled tick information.

The server sends the Sub Tick Order to the client as a Long, meaning it will continuously increase. When this option is enabled, it will be sorted on the client side and reordered starting from 1 based on its value.
config.scheduledtickvisualizer.trigger_t: When enabled, the remaining time until the execution of scheduled ticks will be rendered.
config.scheduledtickvisualizer.tick_prio: When enabled, the priority of planned ticks will be rendered.
